document.full_text: in the latest dealbook portrait video, laurence fink of blackrock talks about his fallout with blackstone's stephen schwarzman, his failed attempts to get a job at goldman sachs and his early trading stumble.
document.title: dealbook portraits: laurence d. fink
lines_and_colors: in the latest dealbook portrait video, laurence fink of blackrock talks about his fallout with blackstone's stephen schwarzman, his failed attempts to get a job at goldman sachs and his early trading stumble.
